name: Uniboom-War of Unicorns
description:
This tower defense game with real-time strategy is a charming game about the war between two unicorn fractions.

Features
The game contains, alongside a tutorial, a story mode with 10 story levels with 3 different environments. Besides, four endless-level exists.
In Uniboom, players must defend the realm of white unicorns by skillfully placing units. The units can gain experience and level up during a game level. This allows their properties (e. g. damage, attack speed) to be upgraded. These upgrades are only active at this game level.
The player can permanently improve the properties of the defender units with an in-game shop with earned in-game currency (rainbow-donuts).

The main menu provides access to statistics, in which information such as the number of defeated opponents, damage per unit, or earned donut can be viewed.
The game and statistics can be manually reset by the player in the settings.

Generally:
The game can be played in a few hours, but depending on the type of player, it can offer hours of entertainment.
